text: Motlotlehi(oa Egepeta) o re: “Ke lorile ke bona likhomo tse nonneng tse supileng, li jeoa ke likhomo tse supileng tse otileng; le litsejana tse supileng tse talana tsa koro ekasitana le tse supileng tse bajooeng. Oho lona matona! Ntlhalosetseng toro ea ka, haeba le ka khona ho hlalosa litoro.”
